与嗳气疾病相关的饮食习惯或胃肠道疾病打嗝是一种常见的身体功能，但当它升级到干扰日常生活的程度时，就被定义为打嗝障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Dietary-habits-or-胃肠道疾病-关联-with-the-development-of-belching-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Dietary-habits-or-胃肠道疾病相关-with-the-development-of-belching-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ef2eef3-794d-457c-9f09-9b589df808ae Tue, 03 Sep 2024 09:23:23 -0400 Dietary habits or gastrointestinal disease associated with the development of belching disorders
研究表明产前接触大麻会导致注意力缺陷多动症（ADHD）风险略有增加一项新研究揭示了产前接触大麻的神经精神风险的微妙发现。研究发现，后代患注意力缺陷多动症的风险略有增加，并且更容易吸食大麻。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Study-reveals-slight-increase-in-ADHD-risk-from-prenatal-cannabis-exposure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Study-reveals-slight-increase-in-ADHD-risk-from-prenatal-cannabis-exposure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c180111-7c16-44cf-8f91-0d7aea03676b Tue, 03 Sep 2024 09:09:00 -0400 Study reveals slight increase in ADHD risk from prenatal cannabis exposure
汗液驱动的可穿戴设备可实现指尖持续健康监测汗液驱动的可穿戴设备有潜力像佩戴创可贴一样轻松地进行持续、个性化的健康监测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Sweat-powered-wearable-enables-continuous-health-monitoring-from-the-fingertip.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Sweat-powered-wearable-enables-continuous-health-monitoring-from-the-fingertip.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=edb308d0-04cf-4d34-85b9-be46e135d6c0 Tue, 03 Sep 2024 09:01:35 -0400 Sweat-powered wearable enables continuous health monitoring from the fingertip

研究人员开发出用于前列腺癌靶向α疗法的稳定化合物含有砹211 (211At) 的化合物可用于前列腺癌的靶向放射治疗，但体内的去砹仍然是一个重大障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Researchers-develop-stable-compound-for-targeted-alpha-therapy-in-prostate-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Researchers-develop-stable-compound-for-targeted-alpha-therapy-in-prostate-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=70744a2b-c266-462c-a3ca-8e667abfd429 Tue, 03 Sep 2024 07:31:00 -0400 Researchers develop stable compound for targeted alpha therapy in prostate cancer
研究揭示热浪对撒哈拉以南非洲地区围产儿死亡的影响由于气候变化，撒哈拉以南非洲地区的热浪预计将变得更加普遍。卡罗林斯卡学院的研究人员和其他人在《自然医学》上发表的一项新研究揭示了怀孕最后一周的高温与死产和早期新生儿死亡率增加之间存在令人担忧的相关性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Research-reveals-impact-of-heatwaves-on-perinatal-deaths-in-sub-Saharan-Africa.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Research-reveals-impact-of-heatwaves-on-perinatal-deaths-in-sub-Saharan-Africa.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=561a19ef-b3d3-4e74-9bf4-fa52cfd925b0 Tue, 03 Sep 2024 07:24:00 -0400 Research reveals impact of heatwaves on perinatal deaths in sub-Saharan Africa
研究表明头发皮质醇水平较高与儿童行为问题更大在 INMA 项目的一项针对 11 岁儿童的研究中，巴斯克地区大学 (UPV/EHU) 巴斯克环境健康研究小组成员 Ane Arregi 得出的结论是，更大的行为问题与更高的行为问题有关。头发皮质醇水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Study-links-higher-hair-cortisol-levels-to-greater-behavioral-problems-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Study-links-higher-hair-cortisol-levels-to-greater-behavioral-problems-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=970ef33a-973e-4dba-a851-11564be643ee Tue, 03 Sep 2024 07:12:23 -0400 Study links higher hair cortisol levels to greater behavioral problems in children
长期接触空气污染和不良的生活方式选择会增加患非酒精性脂肪肝的风险长期接触空气污染和不良的生活方式选择是导致非酒精性脂肪肝 (NAFLD) 的关键因素，影响全球肝脏健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Long-term-air-pollution-exposure-and-poor-lifestyle-choices-increase-risk-of-non-酒精-脂肪肝-疾病。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Long-term-air-pollution-exposure-and-poor-lifestyle-choices-increase-risk-of-non-酒精-脂肪肝-疾病。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=04057abf-b376-435d-9131-d8a8aef0e261 Tue, 03 Sep 2024 07:06:00 -0400 Long-term air pollution exposure and poor lifestyle choices increase risk of non-alcoholic fatty liver disease
研究表明β细胞可以独立发挥血糖控制作用我们的血糖平衡基于胰腺β细胞检测葡萄糖和分泌胰岛素以维持血糖水平的能力。如果这些细胞发生故障，平衡就会被打破，从而患上糖尿病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Study-shows-beta-cells-can-function-independently-for-glycemic-control.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Study-shows-beta-cells-can-function-independently-for-glycemic-control.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=90b9ae70-de0d-4803-897c-6ab1573e6396 Tue, 03 Sep 2024 06:56:10 -0400 Study shows beta cells can function independently for glycemic control
